facebook.title: Fossil scans reveal origins of teeth
facebook.summary: In terms of developmental biology, it seems likely that conodont "teeth" and dermal plates of early fishes could have a common tissue source, given their similarity. Conodont teeth, however, are not the antecedent to vertebrate teeth.
